name: Block Puzzle: Merge Star
description:
Drag and combine colorful blocks of the same number to score high! The rules are simple, but blocks will quickly fill the screen, forcing you to think on your feet! Collect stars to use the booster for even more fun!

If you love math, numbers, or addictive puzzle games, Block Puzzle: Merge Star is the game for you!

HOW TO PLAY
1. Just drag the block onto another one with the same number
2. Merge them into a bigger number!
3. You can remove the blocks by charging the booster gauge!
4. Try to remove multiple blocks at a time to get higher score :D

FEATURES
• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy block puzzle anytime, anywhere!
• FREE TO PLAY & Suitable for all ages.
• NO penalties & time limits; You can enjoy Block Puzzle at your own pace!

NOTES
• Block Puzzle: Merge Star supports mobile phones & tablet PCs.
• Block Puzzle: Merge Star contains ads varying from banners, interstitials, videos to house ads.
• Block Puzzle: Merge Star is free to play, however, you may purchase Ad-Free, Booster item, and coins.
